name: Papercat (itch)
description:
Papercat is a collaborative prototype created by Jan Plähn, Natali Arvidsson  and Ana Laura Martinez.

Your goal is to work together to reach the end! You can pick up each other and the things around you to help you jump over obstacles. Be careful with the shredders, they will definitely destroy you.
This game experiments with the concept of trust! If the game seems to be "buggy" it is actually a hidden mechanic we added to create distrust between players. Don't worry, we are sure you can work around it :)

***

- This game needs two controllers to be played.
- Read instructions to learn how to throw! Can be really frustrating otherwise.

***

Music by Kevin McLeod
